categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic planets

nodes.text: Ord Gimmel was a planet located on the same path as Sullust, acting as a trade hub and manufacturing center. However, it was also war-torn, with its queen having mysteriously disappeared in 1 BBY, a year before the Death Star was destroyed over Yavin 4. During the Galactic Civil War, this was one of the planets on which the Alliance to Restore the Republic was stationed.
